name: stop it dead plants
author: nabilellaji
notes: Made my first KOG with this deck !! made it from plat 1 to legend 3  using a flying fish mindscan deck !! but i just couldn't get my 5 streak to KOG! Sylvans made it  easy with only 1 day of practice ! I'm 100% f2p so i didn't have all the cards i needed! probably would have added in 1 shroom.
